thunderbird.instructions: Thunderbird MCP quirks: create_filter conditions are ANDed — create one filter per sender for OR logic; create_folder parent_uri must be an existing folder (INBOX works), not the account root — returns path:null, call list_folders for the real URI; get_recent_messages without folder returns all accounts interleaved and Gmail duplicates across labels; Spam folder causes JSON errors — do not read it; filters apply to future mail only.
